detail_desc: Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, braided belt and fake fly and press-stud. Decorative fabric appliqués at the front, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend in a relaxed fit. Contrasting colour yoke that continues down the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered hat in soft cotton jersey.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Platform sandals in imitation suede with open toes and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and concealed elastication. Imitation leather insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 8 cm.
Boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Necklace of thin metal chains, one of which is decorated with a pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with buttons at the top and ribbed cuffs.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in a fine knit with a double layer at the top and long sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Lined wellingtons with a loop at the back and chunky soles. Heel 2.2 cm.

Set with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in soft jersey. Top with print motifs on the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and a print motif.
High-waisted trousers in a soft cotton weave with a detachable tie belt, front pockets and tapered legs with a tab and metal D-rings at the hems.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Set of three metal hair grips in various designs and one pair of earrings in metal covered in sparkly stones.Length of hair grips approx. 6 cm. Diameter of earrings approx. 3 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Smocking at the top,long sleeves and elasticated cuffs with a flounce.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in a viscose weave with flounces. V-neck front and back, a concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit gloves and matching fingerless gloves with a glow-in-the-dark print motif. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Round-necked cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with glistening buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Block-patterned T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in striped satin with elastication and a drawstring at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Sandals with straps at the front and a wrapover ankle strap with an adjustable fastener. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam under the bust, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined crotch.
Cotton twill cap with an embroidered appliqué on the front and peak. Ties at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, one with an all-over print. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
Fully lined, 5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and legs with narrow hems.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon crêpe with a frilled collar. Deep opening at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck and back. Long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and narrow, covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seams creating tiers at the waist and hips. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Wellingtons with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top and short, elasticated puff sleeves with a frill trim. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Push-up bra in ribbed jersey with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
Dress in soft, fine-knit, organic cotton with a lace-knit section at the top. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves, and a lace-knit section at the hem.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a hood, small appliqué at the bottom, long sleeves and a layer of jersey at the hem.
Jersey tube scarf with a text print and fleece lining. Length 34 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length flared skirt in a jacquard weave with a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round neckline, gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, straight hem with slits in the sides and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Waist bag in woven fabric with a large zipped compartment with a carabiner hook and woven handle on the front. Zipped compartment at the back, an inner compartment and an adjustable waist belt with a plastic snap lock. Lined. Size 5x18x32 cm.
Joggers in soft jersey with wide elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
T-shirt in airy, softly draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, belt with a metal buckle, side pockets, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow on the shoulders. Elastication at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Non-wired bra in soft cotton jersey with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, cap sleeves, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
Running shorts in fast-drying, stretch jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ventilating mesh sections at the top and crotch. Mesh inner shorts.
Tunic in a softly draping weave with a V-neck, gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2 cm to 5 cm.

Trousers in a soft rib knit containing some wool. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs with narrow, ribbed trims at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.

Slightly boxy jacket in airy, rustly nylon with a high collar, drawstring hood and zip down the front with a wind flap. Loose yoke at the waist, side pockets, low dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves. Wide, covered elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.

Short dress in an airy organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top and short, voluminous puff sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam under the bust and a scalloped hem. Lining in jersey made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck at the back with crossover straps. Long sleeves, narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a roll-edge hem.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short shirt dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Smocked seam under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in a crinkled viscose and nylon weave. Deep V-neck with lacing, and a frill-trimmed seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a rib-knit viscose blend with a ribbed neckline, decorative eyelets at the top, cut-out sections at the shoulders and long sleeves.
Fitted top in sturdy jersey with a square neckline and wide shoulder straps.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Hair claws in metal and plastic. Size 3.5 cm.
Fitted, off-the shoulder top in a fine rib knit with a wide lace trim at the top and long sleeves.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Double-layered, wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shoulder bag with a flap and decorative metal buckle and a shoulder strap with metal chains at the ends. Lined.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
